search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Mailmodo (mailmodo.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Mailmodo can be found at: [https://www.mailmodo.com/pricing](https://www.mailmodo.com/pricing).

Group_1110165936_6a87223d4c](https://www.mailmodo.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fmailmodo%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1689669481%2Fstrapi%2FGroup_1110165936_6a87223d4c.png&w=1920&q=75) Frequently asked questions -------------------------- Everything you need to know about the AMP email idea generator. ### Does Mailmodo create/send only AMP emails? ![Image 287](blob:http://localhost/c13ffe55ca7d1ff9bf6a888a34792a6b)![Image 288: chevron-down](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) Mailmodo enables but is not limited to creating and sending of AMP emails. You can create, send and automate both AMP and HTML email campaigns without any tech intervention. ### What is AMP for email? ![Image 289](blob:http://localhost/c13ffe55ca7d1ff9bf6a888a34792a6b)![Image 290: chevron-down](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) AMP email is an open-source framework created by Google that allows emails to render and display dynamic elements like accordions, carousels, forms, calendars, shopping carts, dynamic APIs, etc. It creates a mini-website inside an email. ### Are there any limitations of AMP emails? ![Image 291](blob:http://localhost/c13ffe55ca7d1ff9bf6a888a34792a6b)![Image 292: chevron-down](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) AMP emails are just like any other emails except the fact that they come with several superpowers. Not every email client renders AMP emails though. At present, AMP email is supported by Gmail, GSuite, Yahoo and Mail.ru. If a user's email client doesn't support AMP emails, the recipient will see a plain TML fallback email we provide options for. ### Can I send AMP emails from my current platform? ![Image 293](blob:http://localhost/c13ffe55ca7d1ff9bf6a888a34792a6b)![Image 294: chevron-down](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) Most likely, no. Most ESPs don’t support sending AMP emails. Nor can you import AMP emails to your current platform. Unfortunately, our email infrastructure does not work like that. But you can use both together with a range of triggers and integrations Mailmodo has. That way you can get the best of both worlds. ### Do I have to switch from my current email tool to use Mailmodo? ![Image 295](blob:http://localhost/c13ffe55ca7d1ff9bf6a888a34792a6b)![Image 296: chevron-down](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) Not necessarily. Mailmodo is a complete email marketing platform that offers the same functionality as your ESP. But if you’d prefer not to switch, Mailmodo offers a range of integrations with email tools, CRMs and marketing analytics platforms to make your experience seamless. ### Can I send transactional emails with Mailmodo? ![Image 297](blob:http://localhost/c13ffe55ca7d1ff9bf6a888a34792a6b)![Image 298: chevron-down](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3) Of course. Mailmodo’s API for Transaction Email enables developers to set up transactional email campaigns using REST API without having to code the emails Still confused about pricing?
